review: This is among the worst products I've ever purchased. It rarely works. It constantly jumps off the network. Basically every time I want to use it, I have to go through a 20 minute troubleshooting process:Restart the chromecastReset my wirelessReset up the chromecastOh what's that? Still not working?!!*starts over*Next morning I wake up and have to do it all over again.It sucks. I wish I could send it in a gift wrapped box back to the engineers and product managers who manage the product. It shouldn't be this difficult. It should just work.
author: Boz1200

review: piece of junk not worth 40 bucks I got it as a gift and got rid of it don't waste your money
author: Larry Sprissler
